title: Nintendo Switch: Four Years In - Scott The Woz
author: Scott The Woz
description:
Scott celebrates a 2 year anniversary of a 2 year anniversary.

Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/ScottTheWoz
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ScottTheWoz/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/scottthewoz/
